lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What was the name of the old priest and his wife?
What was Zechariah chosen to do in the temple?
What surprising thing did Zechariah see in the temple?
answers: A vision of the whole nation

questions.text: What did Gabriel say would happen to Elizabeth?
answers: She would become a temple servant

questions.text: What were some things Gabriel said about this baby?
answers: He would be filled with God's Spirit before birth and prepare the way for the Lord
He would become a great king of Israel
He would write many books of Scripture

questions.text: Because he didn't believe the angel, what happened to Zechariah?
answers: He couldn't speak until the baby was born
He fell asleep for many days
He was blinded until the next morning

questions.text: What happened when pregnant Mary visited pregnant Elizabeth?
answers: John leapt for joy inside his mother's belly

questions.text: What did Elizabeth's neighbors do after she had her baby?
answers: They held a feast for seven days
They sent messages to the priests

questions.text: How did Zechariah tell them to give the baby the name John?
answers: He signaled it with his hands
He asked Mary to announce it

questions.text: When Zechariah could speak again, what was the first thing he did?
answers: He ran outside to tell the neighbors
